attributes.action: Cancel the painting of PM’s plane to save £900,000.
attributes.additional_details: There is a global pandemic. The NHS is massively underfunded. We’re going to enter a recession. There’s better ways to spend almost £1m.
attributes.background: Cancel the painting of the PM’s plane red, white and blue and use the money for something that’s actually important.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327376
